languages.text: "К сожалению, Эмелину пришлось отослать и вывести из игры. Принципиальная и догадливая — раньше я ценил эти качества в ней, но внезапно они начали вредить моему замыслу. Было бы правильнее ликвидировать ее, пока она ни о чем не догадалась, но... С годами я стал скареден и перестал разбрасываться полезными агентами. А может, дело в сентиментальности".

"Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, Эмелину пришлось отослать и вывести из игры. Принципиальная и догадливая — раньше я ценил эти качества в ней, но внезапно они начали вредить моему замыслу. Было бы правильнее ликвидировать ее, пока она ни о чем не догадалась, но... С годами я стал скареден и перестал разбрасываться полезными агентами. А может, дело в сентиментальности".

traits.locale_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emeline away and sideline her. A shrewd woman of principle — I had previously valued those qualities of her, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been right to just liquidate her before she could understand what was going on, but... I guess I have become stingy and didn't want to lose a good agent. Or perhaps it was sentimentality."

"Unfortunately, I had to send Emeline away and sideline her. A shrewd woman of principle — I had previously valued those qualities of her, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been right to just liquidate her before she could understand what was going on, but... I guess I have become stingy and didn't want to lose a good agent. Or perhaps it was sentimentality."

"Unfortunately, I had to send Emeline away and sideline her. A shrewd woman of principle that she is—I had previously valued those qualities of her, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been right to just eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I guess I have become stingy and don't want to be down one good agent. Or perhaps it is my mawkishness speaking."

"Unfortunately, I had to send Emeline away and sideline her. A shrewd woman of principle that she is—I had previously valued those qualities of her, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been right to just eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I guess I have become stingy and don't want to be down one good agent. Or perhaps it is my mawkishness speaking."

"Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

"Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

languages.text: « Malheureusement, j'ai dû éloigner Emelina et l'écarter du projet. C'est une femme intelligente avec des principes, des qualités que j'appréciais chez elle, mais qui représentaient soudain un obstacle à mon plan. Il aurait été plus sûr de l'éliminer avant qu'elle ne comprenne ce qu'il se passait, mais... je ne voulais pas perdre un bon agent. J'ai dû devenir avare au fil des années, à moins que je me sois laissé aller à la sentimentalité. »
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

traits.locale_text: « Malheureusement, j'ai dû éloigner Emelina et l'écarter du projet. C'est une femme intelligente avec des principes, des qualités que j'appréciais chez elle, mais qui représentaient soudain un obstacle à mon plan. J'aurais aussi bien pu me contenter de l'éliminer avant qu'elle ne comprenne ce qui se passait, mais... je ne voulais pas perdre un bon agent. J'ai dû devenir avare au fil des années, à moins que je me sois laissé aller à la sentimentalité. »

languages.text: «Por desgracia, tuve que apartar a Emelina de todo esto. Era una mujer inteligente y de principios, cualidades que valoraba hasta que empezaron a interferir en mi plan. Habría sido más seguro eliminarla antes de que averiguara lo que estaba ocurriendo, pero... será que me he vuelto tacaño con la edad y no quería deshacerme de una buena agente. O tal vez fuera pura sensiblería».
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

traits.locale_text: «Por desgracia, tuve que enviar a Emeline a otra parte y dejarla de lado. Es una mujer de principios muy astuta, y esas cualidades me habían servido muy bien en el pasado, pero ahora empezaban a interferir con mi plan. Podría haberla eliminado antes de que averiguara lo que estaba ocurriendo, pero... supongo que, a esas alturas, me preocupaban los recursos y no quería perder a otra buena agente. O tal vez fuera pura sensiblería».

languages.text: “很遗憾，我不得不把艾米莉娜打发走，将她从我的圈子中除名。她是个有原则的人，而且很精明。我曾经很看重她这些品质，但突然之间，她这些品质开始妨碍起了我的计划。我本该在她弄清楚发生什么事情之前把她直接干掉，不过……我猜我可能变得太吝啬了，舍不得消灭我出色的代理人。又或许，我只是变得多愁善感了吧。”
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

traits.locale_text: “很遗憾，我不得不把艾米莉娜打发走，让她到一边呆着去。她是个有原则的人，而且很精明。我曾经很看重她这些品质，但突然之间，她这些品质开始妨碍起了我的计划。我本该在她弄清楚发生什么事情之前把她直接干掉，不过……我猜我可能有点太吝啬了，舍不得消灭我出色的代理人。又或许，可能是因为我变得多愁善感了吧。”

languages.text: "Unglücklicherweise musste ich Emelina fortschicken und sie vom Spielbrett nehmen. Eine kluge Frau mit Prinzipien — früher waren mir diese Eigenschaften nützlich gewesen, doch nun behinderten sie meinen Plan plötzlich. Es wäre sicherer gewesen, sie zu eliminieren, bevor sie herausfindet, was vor sich geht, doch ... ich bin im Lauf der Jahre wohl geizig geworden und zögerte, mich von einer guten Agentin zu trennen. Oder vielleicht war ich schlicht sentimental."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

traits.locale_text: "Leider musste ich Emelina fortschicken und aus dem Spiel nehmen. Sie ist eine kluge Frau mit Prinzipien. Zuvor hatte ich diese Eigenschaften an ihr bewundert, doch nun standen sie plötzlich meinem Plan im Weg. Es wäre richtig gewesen, sie einfach zu eliminieren, bevor sie herausfindet, was vor sich geht, doch ... Ich bin wohl etwas geizig geworden und will keinen guten Agenten verlieren. Oder vielleicht spricht da nur meine Gefühlsduselei aus mir."

languages.text: 「残念なことに、私はエメリナを遠ざけ、計画から引き離さなければならなかった。彼女は抜け目のない女性で、かつてはその資質を高く評価していたのだが、突然、私の計画の妨げになり始めたのだ。彼女が事態を把握する前に排除してしまう方が安全だったのだが…年月が経ち、私も物を惜しむようになってしまったようだ。優秀なエージェントを手放したくなかったのだ。あるいは、単に感傷的になっていたのかもしれない」
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."

traits.locale_text: 「残念なことに、私はエメリナを遠ざけ、計画から引き離さなければならなかった。彼女は抜け目のない女性で、かつてはその資質を高く評価していたのだが、突然、私の計画の妨げになり始めたのだ。彼女が事態を把握する前に排除してしまう方が安全だったのだが…年月が経ち、私も物を惜しむようになってしまったようだ。優秀なエージェントを手放したくなかったのだ。あるいは、単に感傷的になっていたのかもしれない」

languages.text: "Maalesef ki Emelina'yı uzaklaştırmak ve onu gemiden indirmek zorunda kaldım. Prensip sahibi kurnaz bir kadındı. Bu özelliklerine değer verirdim ama sonradan sonraya planıma engel oluşturmaya başladılar. Neler döndüğünü anlamaya başlamadan önce onu ortadan kaldırmak daha güvenli olacaktı ama... Yıllar geçtikçe cimri bir adam olmuş olmalıyım, iyi bir ajanla yollarımı ayırmak zor geldi. Belki de duygusallığım tuttu, bilemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Unfortunately, I had to send Emelina away and remove her from the board. A shrewd woman of principle — I used to value those qualities of hers, but suddenly, they started to get in the way of my plan. It would have been safer to eliminate her before she could figure out what was going on, but... I must have grown miserly over the years and was loath to part with a good agent. Or perhaps I was simply being sentimental."
